title: Sound On: Stimulus, Rep. Dusty Johnson
itunes:title: Sound On: Stimulus, Rep. Dusty Johnson
description:
Guests: Steven Dennis, Bloomberg Congress reporter, Marc Sumerlin, economist and managing partner of Evenflow Macro in Washington, Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group, Adam Hodge, Senior Vice President at Ariel Investments, and South Dakota Congressman Dusty Johnson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
